2: <mistake>cing//bdud</mistake> <mistake>bzhi'i</mistake> dgra rnams 'dul byed <mistake>pa// 'dig</mistake> rten rnams kyi <mistake>ngana</mistake> song <mistake>gsum//sbyong</mistake> bar byed pa'i 'jum bstan <mistake>nas//tshangs</mistake> pa'i gsung ni <mistake>snan</mistake> pa <mistake>yis// 'jig</mistake> rten gsum po kun bkang
3: <mistake>ste//lag</mistake> na rdo rje stobs po <mistake>ch// gsang</mistake> dbang la ni slar gsungs <mistake>pa//legs</mistake> so dpal ldan rdo rje <mistake>'chang//lag</mistake> na rdo rje khyod legs <mistake>so//'grol</mistake> <mistake>pha</mistake> <mistake>ma'i</mistake> don du <mistake>khyod//snying</mistake> rje che dang ldan gyur <mistake>cing//</mistake>
4: <mistake>'dam</mistake> dpal ye shes sku yi <mistake>mtshan //yang</mistake> dag brjod pa don che <mistake>ba//dag</mistake> par byed cing sdig sel <mistake>ba//ngo las</mistake> <mistake>mnyan</mistake> par <mistake>brtson</mistake> pa <mistake>ni//gsang</mistake> ba'i bdag po khyod legs <mistake>so//ne</mistake> phyir 'di <mistake>nings</mistake>
5: <mistake>bshadg</mistake> <mistake>bya//khyod</mistake> ni rtse gcig yid kyis <mistake>nyon//bcoms</mistake> ldan de ni legs shes <mistake>gsol//lan</mistake> gyi gsung tshigs su bcad pa drug <mistake>go//de</mistake> nas bcom ldan <mistake>sha gkya</mistake> <mistake>thub//gsang</mistake> sngags mtha' dag
6: rigs chen <mistake>po//gsang</mistake> sngags rig pa <mistake>chang</mistake> ba'i <mistake>rigs//rigs</mistake> gsum la ni rnam <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>gzigs//'jig</mistake> rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i <mistake>rigs/ 'jig</mistake> rten snang byed rigs chen <mistake>dang//phyag</mistake> rgya <mistake>tshan</mistake>
7: <mistake>po'i</mistake> rigs mchog <mistake>dang//gtsug</mistake> tor chen <mistake>po'i</mistake> rigs chen <mistake>no//rigs</mistake> drug la gzigs pa'i tshigs su bcad <mistake>ba</mistake> gnyis <mistake>soa///gsang</mistake> sngags rgyal <mistake>po</mistake> drug ldan <mistake>zhing//gnyis</mistake> su med par 'byung
8: <mistake>ba dang// skye</mistake> ba med pa'i <mistake>cshos</mistake> can <mistake>'di// tshig</mistake> gi bdag <mistake>pos</mistake> <mistake>tshiogs</mistake> bcad <mistake>gsungs//a</mistake> <mistake>a'a ai aAM bu Au ae ae o+o aematHa shi to tre di dzwAan murti ra ha bud+obud+ha nim ta d+wa btI ni/ao bdza uA+ha</mistake>
